option.${mod_id}.profile.keys.tooltip:
The messages for each key will be sent if you press the corresponding hotkey while in-game (depending on individual settings).
You can also send the message(s) for any CommandKey with a single bound key by pressing that key whilst on this screen with nothing selected.
option.${mod_id}.profile.hud.tooltip: Briefly show the sent message/command as a pop-up above the hotbar
option.${mod_id}.key.conflict.submit.too: If the key is already used by Minecraft, this keybind will be cancelled.
option.${mod_id}.key.conflict.assert.too: If the key is already used by Minecraft, this keybind will be activated first, then the other keybind.
option.${mod_id}.key.conflict.veto.toolt:
If the key is already used by Minecraft, the other keybind will be cancelled.
Note: Some keys (such as movement keys) cannot be cancelled.
option.${mod_id}.key.conflict.avoid.tool: This keybind will not function in-game, but can be activated by pressing the key while on the profile options screen (if nothing is selected).
option.${mod_id}.key.mode.forced.tooltip: %s mode is required for conflict strategy %s
option.${mod_id}.key.mode.type.tooltip: The first message will be typed in chat, but not sent.
option.${mod_id}.key.mode.cycle.tooltip:
Messages will be cycled through, one per key-press.
In this mode, you can send multiple messages in a single key-press by separating them with two commas e.g. /lobby,,/nick
option.${mod_id}.key.delay.tooltip:
Delay in ticks before each message after the first.
Set to -1 to use per-message delays.
option.${mod_id}.key.delay.individual.to: Time in ticks to wait after the previous message before sending this one.
option.${mod_id}.key.cycle_index.tooltip: The index of the next message to be sent.
option.${mod_id}.main.profiles.tooltip:
Profiles are automatically activated when you join a world/server linked to a profile.
The default profiles are used when there is no linked profile.
option.${mod_id}.main.default_singleplay: This is the default profile for singleplayer
option.${mod_id}.main.default_multiplaye: This is the default profile for multiplayer
option.${mod_id}.main.name: Name
option.${mod_id}.main.default.tooltip: These options will be used by new CommandKey instances.
